content: Q4 2024 earnings show 12% revenue uptick in investment banking, slight decline in retail banking.
Annual shareholders meeting to approve dividend increase from $0.50 to $0.60 per share.
Risk management review identifies potential exposure in emerging markets debt. Action plan recommended.
Cost-cutting initiative saved $10M in operational expenses, focusing on digital transformation.
Merger discussions with smaller regional bank. NDA in place, no public details yet.
metadata: Due diligence ongoing, potential synergy: $5M annually
